title: #304: The Hunt for a Serial Killer, Rapist, Paedophile, Burglar - Part 8
description:
We resume our coverage of serial perpetrator RR. Jim and Laura analyze the attacks on several families, some in the same night. Lisa wonders why RR never gets rid of the weapons that link him to so many crimes. 


#victimsmatter

#TheseAreOnlyTheOnesWeKnowOf

Give some love to our other projects!!!


KILLER CASTING PODCAST GOES TO THE OSCARS - The Oscars are fast approaching, but Lisa is in a tizzy because she has a love/hate relationship with the Academy Awards. Hear her work out her feelings on the next KILLER CASTING. https://killercasting.libsyn.com/website/017-pre-oscar-discussion


AMERICA’S MOST WANTED - Jim’s new show is a HIT that has already caught several offenders! Don’t miss the new America’s Most Wanted hosted by Elizabeth Vargas. Monday nights 9/8 central on Fox https://www.fox.com/americas-most-wanted/


CRIME ANALYST PODCAST- 

Laura interviews journalist and author Sheron Boyle, who lived in Yorkshire at the time PS was attacking and killing women. https://www.crime-analyst.com/13-the-forgotten-victims-part-13-interview-with-sheron-boyle/
